email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

We are looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this shipment? We are considering FOB terms.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for your inquiry. We have the vessel OCEAN HARMONY (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) available for this shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT on FOB terms. Laycan is 25-30 Oct.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the quote. USD 25.50 seems a bit high. Can you offer a better rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I can offer USD 24.75 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 18,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 24.75 is acceptable. Can we adjust the laycan to 27 Oct - 1 Nov? Also, please confirm the loading window is 72 hours.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Laycan adjusted to 27 Oct - 1 Nov. Loading window is confirmed as 72 hours. Please confirm your agreement so we can finalize the arrangements.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: OCEAN HARMONY
- Cargo: 150,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Tubarão
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 27 Oct - 1 Nov
- Freight: USD 24.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 18,000 per day
- Incoterm: FOB
- Loading Window: 72 hours

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Alex
